Lalkhan Bazar () is the No.14 Ward of Chattogram City Corporation and a part of Khulshi Thana.
Size
Lalkhan Bazar Ward has a total area of .
Population data
According to the 2024 census, the total population of Lalkhan Bazar ward is 75,335, of which 41,075 are male and 34,260 female. Total families are 16,789.
